attributes.background: The Edexcel GCSE Maths Exam, 2016, non Calculator was by far challenging, impotent and confusing.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it concerns a matter that is the responsibility of the Edexcel and Ofqual (the qualifications regulatory) not the UK Government or Parliament. 

It also does not meet our terms and conditions because you have not provided your full name.
